cards.title: Leviathan
setup: Put {Leviathan} into play [i]Citykiller[/i] side up. Reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until you reveal a [i]Tactic[/i] card; put it into play. Shuffle the other cards back into the villain deck
gameplay: When flipped to this side, destroy {H} hero cards.
At the end of the villain turn, {Leviathan} deals 2 melee damage to all hero targets.
At the end of the villain turn, if {Leviathan} has been dealt {8 - H} damage in one instance last round, flip {Leviathan}
cards.advanced: Reduce damage dealt to Leviathan by 1
flippedGameplay: When flipped to this side, reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until you reveal a [i]Tactic[/i] card. Put it into play; shuffle the rest of the revealed cards back into the villain deck.
At the start of the villain turn, flip {Leviathan}
Reduce damage dealt to Leviathan by 1
cards.flippedAdvanced: The first time Leviathan would flip each turn, play the top card of the villain deck first

cards.title: Water Shadow
cards.body: Whenever {LeviathanCharacter} would deal melee damage to a target, this card deals that target 2 irreducible melee damage. This card is indestructible
cards.flavorText: It was Alexandria who speared forward to confront Leviathan.{BR}He saw her coming, ceased his onslaught to rear back and then lunge ahead to meet her.{BR}When they were only fifteen feet apart, he stopped, let his water echo rush forward to meet her.

cards.title: Torrential Downpour
cards.body: Whenever a player would draw a card, {LeviathanCharacter} deals that player's character card 1 cold damage. This card is indestructible
cards.flavorText: The windows were rattling with the force of the rain against them.{BR}It was almost impossible to see through them with the water that streamed down,{BR}and the overall gloom beyond.

cards.title: Lose The War
body: If the environment deck is ever empty, the heroes lose the game. At the end of the villain turn, remove the top card of the environment deck from the game.
Players may skip any of their phases (play, power, draw). Any time a player skips a phase, they may take a card from the environment trash and shuffle it back into the environment deck

flavorQuotes.text: These were errors, grave mistakes from defending heroes.{BR}We had but one strategy at the time - to hem him in,{BR}minimizing the effects of growing waves and casualties until Leviathan{BR}was beaten into a retreat or Scion arrived. These areas, however, were too vulnerable.{BR}Waiting let Leviathan build up the strength of his attacks, and we lost.

cards.title: Faster Than You'd Think
cards.body: The first time {LeviathanCharacter} would be dealt damage each round, prevent that damage. This card is indestructible

flavorQuotes.text: ...At the speeds Leviathan can move,{BR}surface tension and compressibility make water harder than concrete.

cards.title: Impossible Strength
cards.body: Increase damage dealt by villain cards by 1
cards.flavorText: Leviathan grabbed a car, twisted his entire upper body{BR}to toss it in the style of an olympic hammer-throw.

cards.title: Impossible Toughness
cards.flavorText: Leviathan, nonstandard cardiac, nervous systems: irregular biology.{BR}No standard organs or weak points.{BR}No brain, heart or center of operations for rest of his body.

cards.title: Impossible Endurance
cards.body: At the start of the villain turn, reveal cards from the top of the villain trash until you reveal a one-shot. Play it, and then shuffle the other revealed cards back into the villain trash
cards.flavorText: The Endbringer stood, showing none of the frailty or pain{BR}it had been displaying seconds ago.{BR}The injuries were there, to be sure, his head hung at an angle because of the way the weight{BR}of his head hung on the intact portions of his neck, but he wasn't suffering,{BR}had no trouble putting his full weight on his more injured leg. Had it been an act?

cards.title: Tidal Wave
cards.body: Destroy all environment targets. {LeviathanCharacter} deals X cold damage to all non-villain targets, where X = 1 + the number of cards destroyed in this way
cards.flavorText: Layers of forcefields went up around the far wall in front of{BR}and behind the front windows, and they weren't enough to take the hit.{BR}The building rocked with an impact, the forcefields to the left collapsed,{BR}and the water began to rush in, carrying chunks of brick, glass and the{BR}metal windowframes into the lobby.

cards.title: Cunning
cards.body: Play the top 2 cards of hte villain deck

flavorQuotes.text: ...I want to be clear that despite the image he might convey,{BR}he is not stupid, and he can display a level of cunning{BR}and tactics that can and will catch you off guard.

cards.title: Anyone Can Die
cards.body: {LeviathanCharacter} deals the hero target with the highest HP 5 irreducible melee damage
cards.flavorText: Jotun deceased, CD-6{BR}Dauntless deceased, CD-6.{BR}Alabaster deceased, CD-6.

flavorQuotes.text: ..The primary message I want to convey, even more{BR}than briefing you on the particulars of his abilities, organizing formations and battle plans,{BR}is that I do not want you to underestimate Leviathan

cards.title: Whipping Tail
cards.body: {LeviathanCharacter} deals 2 melee damage to the 2 hero targets with the lowest HP
cards.flavorText: Leviathan retaliated with a whiplike lash of his tail,{BR}bisecting the man. Of the twelve or so that had been on the roof a minute ago, only three remained.
